posts.post_content:
FS: Raw Obak T212-3s (1911) with great eye appeal. A few have creases that are only visible on close inspection, and these are noted below. I have more 1910 and 1911 Obaks that I will be listing (not all of them this nice), so let me know if you’re looking for anything in particular. 

Ables (corner crease lower left) $75 SOLD
Barry (horizontal creases) $70 SOLD
Brinker $95 SOLD
Brown (corner wrinkle upper right) $70 SOLD
Christian $80 SOLD
Hunt $95 SOLD
Kane $85 SOLD
Lamline (crease/wrinkles in middle) $70 SOLD
Swain $85 SOLD
Van Buren $110 SOLD
Willett $75 SOLD
